Action - Enum in it.polimi.LM39.client

askClient(NetworkPlayer) - Method in class it.polimi.LM39.client.CLI
enable client's stream and wait for a response code from https://stackoverflow.com/questions/12803151/how-to-interrupt-a-scanner-nextline-call (future) reflection used on client's response to automatically call the selected method
